aadhaar-sc-pre-count: The text that appears before the count
aadhaar-sc-days: The singluar and plural form of the word 'day' and 'days'
aadhaar-sc-post-count: The text that should appear after the count has been displayed
aadhaar-sc-note: An extra note about the impact of inaction by suprem court
aadhaar-sc-share-text: The text that would be shared in Twitter, FB etc, when user clicks the share buttons
